scriptLines: select1 filter(!isNull(date) && open >= 0 && high >= 0 && low >= 0 && close >= 0 && adjClose >= 0 && volume >= 0 && !isNull(change)) ~> filter1
select1 filter(price > 0 && dayLow >= 0 && dayHigh >= 0 && yearLow >= 0 && yearHigh >= 0 && marketCap > 0 && !isNull(pe) && !isNull(eps)) ~> filter1
